comment: "After numerous proddings (and legal threats), I finally got paid. Or at least I received two-thirds of what I was owed 8.5 months after it was due. Stay away from this publisher if you want to preserve your peace of mind."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "This has taught me to be extra wary of who I will work for in the future. Contracts evidently don't mean a thing when it comes to freelance assignments. Do not ever accept an assignment from Consumers Digest Magazine!"
